wsepr.easypoi.excel.editor
类 RegionEditor

java.lang.Object
  wsepr.easypoi.excel.editor.AbstractEditor
      wsepr.easypoi.excel.editor.AbstractRegionEditor<RegionEditor>
          wsepr.easypoi.excel.editor.RegionEditor

public class RegionEditor
extends AbstractRegionEditor<RegionEditor>

区域编辑器，可设置一个区域的样式、单元格格式、合并区域或插入图片
